plot: London, nineteenth century. The grumpy Larry returns home after his usual evening walk. He has had a bad day. Now he will lie down and rest.
title: Penumbra 3D: El desafortunado reencuentro de Larry y Bird
plot_es: London, nineteenth century. The grumpy Larry returns home after his usual evening walk. He has had a bad day. Now he will lie down and rest.
original_name: Penumbra 3D: El desafortunado reencuentro de Larry y Bird
